H0.text: What is the name of the line that darts players stand behind to throw. Throwline

H1.text: What is the name of the line that darts players stand behind to throw. Dartmark

H2.text: What is the name of the line that darts players stand behind to throw. Pitchline

H3.text: What is the name of the line that darts players stand behind to throw. Oche

A4.text: The line behind which the thrower must stand is called the oche.
